name: Christian Evolution Leaflet (IAPSOP)
content:
Christian Evolution Leaflet (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Christian Evolution Leaflet Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Christian Evolution Leaflet. Demonstrated facts in Physics and Metaphysics, supercede all traditional beliefs 1896—1897? Monthly Brooklyn, NY. 1/1, September 1896. 4 pp., 1 cent a copy. A monthly publication listing the weekly Sunday lectures during the coming month at Co-Operative Hall in Brooklyn. NSAC, Lily Dale. Issues:Christian Evolution Leaflet V1 N1 Sep 1896 Christian Evolution Leaflet V1 N2 Oct 10 1896 Christian Evolution Leaflet V1 N3 Oct 24 1896 Christian Evolution Leaflet V1 N4 Nov 7 1896 Christian Evolution Leaflet V1 N5 Nov 21 1896 Christian Evolution Leaflet V1 N6 Dec 5 1896 Christian Evolution Leaflet V1 N7 Dec 19 1896 Christian Evolution Leaflet V1 N8 Jan 9 1897
